17  
18  package org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.exception.postgresql.vendor;
19  
20  import lombok.Getter;
21  import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
22  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.exception.postgresql.sqlstate.PostgreSQLState;
23  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.exception.core.external.sql.sqlstate.SQLState;
24  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.exception.core.external.sql.sqlstate.XOpenSQLState;
25  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.exception.core.external.sql.vendor.VendorError;
26  
27  /**
28   * PostgreSQL vendor error.
29   *
30   * @see <a href="https://www.postgresql.org/docs/12/errcodes-appendix.html">Appendix A. PostgreSQL Error Codes</a>
31   */
32  @RequiredArgsConstructor
33  @Getter
34  public enum PostgreSQLVendorError implements VendorError {
35      
36      SUCCESSFUL_COMPLETION(XOpenSQLState.SUCCESSFUL_COMPLETION, "successful_completion"),
37      
38      PRIVILEGE_NOT_GRANTED(XOpenSQLState.PRIVILEGE_NOT_GRANTED, "Access denied for user '%s' to database '%s'"),
39      
40      PROTOCOL_VIOLATION(PostgreSQLState.PROTOCOL_VIOLATION, "expected %s response, got message type %s"),
41      
42      FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED(XOpenSQLState.FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED, "feature_not_supported"),
43      
44      DUPLICATE_DATABASE(PostgreSQLState.DUPLICATE_DATABASE, "Database '%s' already exists"),
45      
46      DUPLICATE_TABLE(PostgreSQLState.DUPLICATE_TABLE, "Table '%s' already exists"),
47      
48      INVALID_AUTHORIZATION_SPECIFICATION(XOpenSQLState.INVALID_AUTHORIZATION_SPECIFICATION, "unknown username: %s"),
49      
50      NO_USERNAME(XOpenSQLState.INVALID_AUTHORIZATION_SPECIFICATION, "no PostgreSQL user name specified in startup packet"),
51      
52      INVALID_PASSWORD(PostgreSQLState.INVALID_PASSWORD, "password authentication failed for user \"%s\""),
53      
54      INVALID_CATALOG_NAME(XOpenSQLState.INVALID_CATALOG_NAME, "database \"%s\" does not exist"),
55      
56      UNDEFINED_COLUMN(PostgreSQLState.UNDEFINED_COLUMN, "Column \"%s\" of table \"%s\" does not exist"),
57      
58      DATA_SOURCE_REJECTED_CONNECTION_ATTEMPT(XOpenSQLState.DATA_SOURCE_REJECTED_CONNECTION_ATTEMPT, "server rejected establishment of sql connection"),
59      
60      TRANSACTION_STATE_INVALID(XOpenSQLState.INVALID_TRANSACTION_STATE, "There is already a transaction in progress"),
61      
62      WRONG_VALUE_COUNT_ON_ROW(PostgreSQLState.SYNTAX_ERROR, "Column count doesn't match value count at row %d"),
63      
64      INVALID_PARAMETER_VALUE(XOpenSQLState.INVALID_PARAMETER_VALUE, "invalid value for parameter \"%s\": \"%s\""),
65      
66      SYSTEM_ERROR(PostgreSQLState.SYSTEM_ERROR, "system_error");
67      
68      private final SQLState sqlState;
69      
70      private final String reason;
71      
72      @Override
73      public int getVendorCode() {
74          return 0;
75      }
76  }
